story_arceus_03_03000/2401_1001_0100_10: OK, N. If I’m understanding this correctly...
story_arceus_03_03000/2401_1001_0200_10:
You want to set up a mock version of the Unova
League so you can redo your challenge. Right?
story_arceus_03_03000/2401_1001_0400_10: In the past, in order to become a hero...
story_arceus_03_03000/2401_1001_0500_10:
I challenged you, Alder, and the Unova Elite Four—
desperately, as if possessed.
story_arceus_03_03000/2401_1001_0600_10:
In the end, it turned out I was being manipulated
by Ghetsis.
story_arceus_03_03000/2401_1001_0700_10:
But through those battles, I was able to deepen my
bond with my Pokémon!
story_arceus_03_03000/2401_1001_0900_10:
I’ve heard that to attain an arc suit I need a
strong bond with my Pokémon...
story_arceus_03_03000/2401_1001_1000_10: and a trial we can overcome together.
story_arceus_03_03000/2401_1001_1100_10:
I want to awaken my arc suit and prove my bond
with my Pokémon is real!
story_arceus_03_03000/2401_1001_1200_10:
I know my request’s a bit selfish, but...
I’d appreciate your help!
story_arceus_03_03000/2401_1001_1300_10: Please let me take on the Unova Elite Four again!
story_arceus_03_03000/2401_1001_1400_10:
Then I hope to challenge Iris, who carries on
your legacy, Alder!
story_arceus_03_03000/2401_1001_1500_10: Alder, I wanna accept his challenge!
story_arceus_03_03000/2401_1001_1600_10:
If I can have a serious battle with N, I think MY
bond with my Pokémon’ll get stronger, too!
story_arceus_03_03000/2401_1001_1800_10:
If that’s how Iris feels, I’d be more than happy to
oversee this challenge!
story_arceus_03_03000/2401_1001_1900_10: I’ll have a chat with the Elite Four right away!
story_arceus_03_03000/2401_1001_2100_10: N, I’m sure you already know this...
story_arceus_03_03000/2401_1001_2200_10:
But since arriving on Pasio, Iris and the Elite Four
have made great strides, too.
story_arceus_03_03000/2401_1001_2300_10:
You may have beaten them once before...
But don’t expect this trial to be easy.
